title.rendered: Vibradox Plus Shilajit 30 Capsules Boosts Vitality, Stamina, Strength and Overall Wellbeing

content.rendered:
• A potent herbal supplement formulated with Shilajit is well-known for its ability to boost energy levels and vitality, promoting an active and healthy lifestyle.

  • This ancient ingredient has traditionally been used to enhance strength and stamina, acting as a natural antioxidant to combat oxidative stress and support overall well-being.
  • It strengthens the immune system, helping the body resist illnesses, and is renowned for its rejuvenating properties that support health and vitality, this high-potency formula maximizes the benefits of Shilajit for overall health.

Key Benefits:

  • Boosts energy and promotes an active lifestyle, increases stamina and enhances strength and vitality, contributing to improved resilience against illnesses.
  • Known for its rejuvenating properties.
  • Formulated with pure Shilajit extract, enriched with minerals and fulvic acid for maximum benefits.
  • Enriched with Ashwagandha, Gokshur, and Kraunchbeej which supports health for both men and women.
Ingredients: Shilajit Extract, Gokshur extract, Ashwagandha extract, Krounchbeej powder, Safed Musli powder, Excipients qs.
Direction of use: Take 1 capsule twice daily preferably after meals or as directed by the physician for better results it should be taken with warm water.
Legal Disclaimer: This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. This product is a dietary supplement, not medicine.
